data.name: about
data.value: Hospital appointment system R-Preference prioritizes user experience by offering fast and effective access to healthcare services on our website.

data.name: aboutP
data.value: With its easy-to-use and user-friendly interface, R-Preference saves time by allowing patients to plan their doctor appointments online. In addition, our system has a reliable and secure structure, allowing you to organize your health appointments smoothly while protecting your personal data. With its modern and technologically compatible structure, R-Preference offers a reliable solution to its users by supporting digital transformation in healthcare services. Choosing our website opens the doors to easier access to your health with a fast, safe and user-oriented appointment experience.

data.name: adi
data.value: Can I make an appointment for emergencies?

data.name: adip
data.value: It is not possible to make an appointment for emergencies. It is recommended that you use the hospital's emergency department for emergencies.

data.name: ashP
data.value: The unit provides 24/7 service for sudden health problems, accidents and emergencies and provides fast and effective interventions.

data.name: chP
data.value: This unit, where surgeries and surgical interventions are performed, offers a wide range of surgical treatment options.

data.name: dahiliyeP
data.value: A polyclinic that provides services in the field of internal medicine to evaluate the general health status of patients, make a diagnosis and create treatment plans.

data.name: dkP
data.value: A unit that includes pregnancy follow-up, birth services, gynecological examinations and various services for women's health.

data.name: gmaP
data.value: R-Preference has a modern infrastructure that offers a secure digital environment. Integrated security measures protect users' health information while emphasizing that the system is a technologically up-to-date and reliable platform.

data.name: gp
data.value: This polyclinic, which provides diagnosis, treatment and follow-up services for eye health, is managed by ophthalmologists and addresses many eye-related problems.

data.name: hd
data.value: Can I make an appointment outside the hospital?

data.name: hdp
data.value: Yes, most hospitals allow you to make an appointment outside the hospital through their online appointment system. You can use this service via the internet or mobile application.

data.name: hlog
data.value: Please log in to access the doctor panel or for other transactions.

data.name: hlog2
data.value: Please log in to make an appointment or perform other transactions.

data.name: imkanlarP
data.value: Our hospital offers high-quality and comprehensive healthcare services to its patients with state-of-the-art facilities equipped with modern medical technology and expert medical staff.

data.name: kdP
data.value: R-Preference allows patients to easily use the appointment system with a simple and user-friendly interface. Quick access features allow users to instantly schedule doctor appointments, keeping time wasted to a minimum

data.name: KP
data.value: Focusing on heart and circulatory system problems, this polyclinic offers diagnosis, follow-up and treatment services to patients by cardiologists.

data.name: krP
data.value: The system provides personalized appointment scheduling options by focusing on patients' individual needs. This feature allows patients to choose their preferred doctors and convenient times and dates, providing a more personalized healthcare experience.

data.name: mtP
data.value: Our hospital aims to keep the health of our patients at the highest level and offers comprehensive health services in accordance with modern medical standards. This importance we attach to health supports our patients to achieve the best results with accurate diagnosis, effective treatment and personalized care.

data.name: NP
data.value: The outpatient clinic, managed by neurologists specializing in nervous system disorders, focuses on various neurological problems, especially headaches and epilepsy.

data.name: RİP
data.value: To cancel an appointment, you can usually cancel your appointment by logging in online or through the call center.

data.name: SSS1
data.value: What are some suggestions for dealing with appointment delays?

data.name: SSS1P
data.value: To avoid or deal with appointment delays, it is recommended to arrive in advance at the appointment time, confirm by phone before the appointment if necessary, and avoid busy hours.

data.name: techP
data.value: R-Preference is an online platform that allows patients to easily manage their healthcare appointments using cutting-edge technology.

data.name: WhyUsP
data.value: Our hospital appointment system, R-Preference, provides a strong answer to the question of why us by offering a unique experience to our patients. We play a leading role in healthcare services with our user-friendly interface, quick access and personalized appointment scheduling options. In addition, thanks to its safe and modern infrastructure, R-Preference reflects our determination to provide the best healthcare service to our patients.
